definition: person representing the dead (during burial ceremonies)/to put a corpse on display (after execution)/variant of 屍|尸[shi1]/corpse
to check/to examine/to inspect/to exercise restraint

sentences.english: Autopsy results in these categories were similar to MDCT results for both study groups.
sentences.chinese: 在两组中尸检结果和多层螺旋CT相似。

sentences.english: Therefore, detailed corpse check of Shi generation Xi son can carry to return to this office to carry on.
sentences.chinese: 因此，矢代夕子的详细尸检只能运回本署进行。

sentences.english: The authorities said the results from an autopsy may not be available for several weeks.
sentences.chinese: 权威人士称尸检结果可能几周之后也不会有结果。

sentences.english: The results were classificated and compared with the former necropsy data.
sentences.chinese: 所得的结果与传统尸检解剖资料进行相关统计学分析。

sentences.english: Virus was eventually isolated from lung samples taken at autopsy.
sentences.chinese: 最终从尸检采集的肺样本中分离出病毒。

sentences.english: Postmortem examination revealed extensive myofascial necrosis and subcutaneous gaseous formation (Figure 3).
sentences.chinese: 尸检发现广泛肌筋膜坏死，皮下气体形成。

sentences.english: Figure 4 shows the locations of these fossae and their frequencies at autopsy.
sentences.chinese: 图4显示了这些隐窝的位置和其尸检的检出率。

sentences.english: A postmortem examination found that she died from multiple injuries.
sentences.chinese: 尸检发现，她因受伤过多而死。

sentences.english: The American public has yet to see the real X-rays and autopsy photographs.
sentences.chinese: 美国民众到现在还没看过X光胶片和尸检照片。

sentences.english: At necropsy, muscles in the leg were white or greyish -white.
sentences.chinese: 尸检主要见腿部肌肉色白或灰白色。

sentences.english: The dignified and beautiful female legal medical expert smoothly says the corpse checks a result.
sentences.chinese: 端庄秀丽的女法医流利地说着尸检结果。

sentences.english: Necropsies revealed internal hemorrhaging, with no sign of pesticides.
sentences.chinese: 尸检表明有内出血，但没有杀虫剂的迹象。

sentences.english: This bladder at autopsy has been opened to reveal areas of hyperemia of the mucosa. this is acute cystitis.
sentences.chinese: 尸检剖开膀胱显示充血粘膜，是急性膀胱炎的表现。

sentences.english: The post-mortem examination concluded that he died from inhalation of a combustible fluid.
sentences.chinese: 尸检官推断他的死因是吸入了易燃流体。

sentences.english: Necropsy of the fetus reveals autolysis which is nonspecific.
sentences.chinese: 胎儿尸检显示非特异性自溶现象。

sentences.english: The results of autopsies indicated that 26 (54%) cases were not relative to medical fault.
sentences.chinese: 尸检结果提示有26例为非医疗过失纠纷。

definition: to examine a wound or injury (typically for forensic purposes)
